about_the_game:
Lost In Parallels is a 2D Platformer based on the exploration of parallel dimensions using a magic flashlight.
Use the flashlight to discover a new dimension. Place it carefully to change the state of the world and find your way through the next dimensions.

Features

  • 16 Unique Dimensions to Explore
  • 16 Key Objects to Collect
  • Speedrun Mode
  • Online Speedrun Leaderboard

Please note, the game is in early stage, a lot more features are coming up !
detailed_description:
Lost In Parallels is a 2D Platformer based on the exploration of parallel dimensions using a magic flashlight.
Use the flashlight to discover a new dimension. Place it carefully to change the state of the world and find your way through the next dimensions.

Features

  • 16 Unique Dimensions to Explore
  • 16 Key Objects to Collect
  • Speedrun Mode
  • Online Speedrun Leaderboard

Please note, the game is in early stage, a lot more features are coming up !

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any 64bits linux distribution
  • Processor: Dual core, 2Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any 64bits linux distribution
  • Processor: Dual core, 2Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 series or similar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core, 2Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 series or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core, 2Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 series or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Explore the infinite dimensions of Lost in Parallels using your flash light ! Collect key objects to access new dimensions ! Challenge your friends and try to put the best score on the speedrun leaderboard !
